content:
Before you came along, I was lucky enough to see
one of these mechanical marvels in action.
Just one swing could gather materials from a whole area - it was so convenient!

Whoever made these mechanical marvels is really amazing.
Having so many functions combined together makes gathering so much easier.
Someone with such brilliant ideas must be quite interesting!

I've read about these marvelous devices in books.
Their exquisite craftsmanship greatly improves gathering efficiency.
Now that I've seen one in person, it truly lives up to its reputation.
